name: SlidingHero
description:
Control five heroes to fight enemies coming from above. All you need to do is slide the heroes to change the formation and activate the effects of their weapons! 

You lose the game when an enemy attacks your hero with 0 HP!!!

The game could be a bit challenging! Please let me know what you think of the gameplay!

Tips

Play on Full Screen for a better experience!

  1. Click "Start" to play.
  2. Hold and Slide the hero with the Flag icon below.
  3. When the Hero is on the Left/Right edge, the Flag will pass to the first hero in the opposite direction.
  4. The Enemies will attack the heroes marked by the red area.
  5. In this demo, You win by killing the boss at level 10!
